description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Lamb Leg and Super Easy Summer Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ Lamb Leg and Super Easy Summer Salad
name: BBQ Lamb Leg and Super Easy Summer Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When lamb is cooked transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest it in a warm place for 15 minutes. Carve the roast across the grain and serve with salad.
